## AbstractSegment.boundingBoxIntersection() method

Computes the list of points on the segment that intersect the given bounding box.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
boundingBoxIntersection(box: BoundingBox): Array<PointXY>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  box | BoundingBox |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;PointXY&gt;

A list of intersecting points
